original_title: ポケモン不思議のダンジョン　時の探検隊・闇の探検隊
overview: Welcome to a world...where Pokémon, and ONLY Pokémon, live. A world where Pokémon can talk -- just like we do. Meet a boy who has mysteriously turned into a Piplup! This Piplup soon meets a Chimchar, who dreams of joining a brave Exploration Team. And at that magical moment, an exciting new adventure begins!  Join us... After all, a whole new world of mystery and exploration awaits! Life is full of adventure, so get ready to explore!
title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time & Darkness
